docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A CLIENT CALLED NOAH A Family Journey Continued. By Josh Greenfeld. 371 pp. New York: Henry Holt & Company. $18.95.

byline.original: By Susan Kenney; Susan Kenney teaches literature and creative writing at Colby College. Her latest novel is ''Graves in Academe.''
